From: Dan Montellese [mailto:dan.montellese@cbord.com]

Cc: Jim Hoefflin <jim id="jdEenLcvaB" data-rand="wleXhG0iHN".hoefflin@cbord.com>; Maxx Channer <Maxx id="jNvXJ6UsqL" data-rand="yQkzXyzHOC".Channer@cbord.com>
Subject: Meeting notes from the Shift4 / CBORD meeting

Jared,

See below for a summary and action items from our meeting – please let me know if you have any changes or additions.

Thanks,
Dan

Meeting Summary.

  *   Shift4 is a large gateway provider to the restaurant and hospitality industries
  *   CBORD is a system provider to the Higher Education, Healthcare, and Corporate markets with a small, but growing, gateway business
  *   Goal of meeting: to explore opportunities for partnership
      *   Shift4 does not have a point of sale system for the markets that CBORD serves, and sometimes has prospective customers who are looking for such a solution.
      *   CBORD does not have a large gateway, and would prefer to avoid the growing expense of maintaining and enhancing its own gateway.
      *   CBORD would like to consider focusing development resources one-and-done systems, while partnering with a gateway provider to handle all transaction processing needs.

Action Items.

  *   Shift4
      *   Introduce CBORD to a customer or two to explore opportunities to team on sales (Jared)
      *   **Consider whether Shift4 would have interest in acquiring/taking over CBORD’s gateway business (Jared to discuss internally and report back)**
  *   CBORD
      *   Consider various options for how a gateway partnership could work (Dan to discuss internally meeting, and Jim reviewed action items. Dan shared that Maxx will reach out to schedule a follow up meeting.

CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This email, including any attachments, is confidential and may be privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, any use, disclosure, distribution or copying is unauthorized. If you have received this email in error, please notify me and permanently delete the original.

Dan Montellese | Senior Solutions Engineer
Direct: 607.257.2866 | Mobile: 607.592.7652
www.cbord.com
